publisher.publisher-name: Department of Hispanic Studies, University of Northern Colorado

title-group.article-title: "Pido que se me coma, / que mi ser en no ser no se mude": misticismo y poesía en Clara Janés

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2014 Board of Trustees of the University of Northern Colorado
